title: Best of the Program | 1/17/22
description:
Glenn gives a monologue explaining how tyranny rises, manipulates, and corrupts and how we can stand up against it. Stu makes the argument that MLK Jr. would be considered a conservative in today's society. Stu explains the synagogue hostage situation that occurred over the weekend.
